entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Blind River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:34 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow changing to periods of light snow near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High 7. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain or snow. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
